title: Research Data Management
text: We provide consulting on managing of your research data. Also have a look at the research data guideline and policy.

title: Data Management Plan
text: We provide consulting creating your Data Management Plan. Please have a look at the DMP template.

title: GitLab at WSL
text: Have you tried GitLab at WSL yet? It allows collaboration with external partners, feel free to ask for an assistance.

title: EnviDat at your Service
text: Of course we provide support on managing and publishing your research data with DOIs on EnviDat, as well as consulting on related topics.

title: HPC at WSL
text: Do you need more computing power? The Hyperion High-Performance Computing (HPC) Linux Cluster of WSL can be used for extensive computing (only available inside the WSL Intranet).

title: Missing Something?
text: Missing a service, a tool or a feature? Let us know via envidat@wsl.ch.
